Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards

Class GoldCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.Card
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.PlaceableCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.PlayCard
it.polimi.ingsw.model.cards.GoldCard
public class GoldCard extends PlayCard
This class represents the gold card, which is mainly responsible for scoring points.

A gold card is the second type of playable card. In addition to the corners and resources, gold cards always have placement points.

What differentiates them mostly from resource cards is the placement cost. In order to place a gold card, enough resources as listed at the bottom of it must be visible in the play area

By default when instantiated a card is facing downwards (displaying back)

  • Constructor Details

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard(GameResource backResource, int pointsOnPlace, Map<GameResource,Integer> plCost, GoldCardStrategy goldStrat, Corner... corners) throws InvalidParameterException
      Constructor for gold card.

      In addition to corners and the back resource, must specify points on place, gold scoring method and placement cost.

      Parameters:
      backResource - the resource displayed on the back
      pointsOnPlace - points multiplier scored on placement
      plCost - a map defining the placement cost of the card
      goldStrat - method of points scoring
      corners - the corners attached to the card
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - when a duplicate corner is found

    • GoldCard

      public GoldCard(String cardID, GameResource backResource, int pointsOnPlace, Map<GameResource,Integer> plCost, GoldCardStrategy goldStrat, Corner... corners) throws InvalidParameterException

      Parameters:
      cardID - unique identifier
      backResource - resource displayed on the back
      pointsOnPlace - placement points
      plCost - placement cost
      goldStrat - gold strategy
      corners - card's corners
      Throws:
      InvalidParameterException - when a duplicate corner is found

    • setPosition

      public PlaceableCard setPosition(GamePoint placement)
      Sets the position of the card.

      In order to make a card an immutable object, this method build a new identical card with the only new information of position.

      Specified by:
      setPosition in class PlaceableCard
      Parameters:
      placement - the position in which the card has to be placed
      Returns:

    • compareCard

      public boolean compareCard(PlaceableCard other)
      This method compares two gold card objects.

      Returns true if the two cards have the same properties: - Orientation;
      - Corners;
      - Back resource and colour;
      - Placement points;
      - Placement cost;
      - Gold strategy.
      Returns false otherwise.

      Overrides:
      compareCard in class PlayCard
      Parameters:
      other - the card with which to compare
      Returns:
      true if the card is the same as the argument; false otherwise
